steps.name: I enter valid Email
I click on Primary Currency dropdown, I should be able to see 72 different curencies
I click on Send Reset Link
I leave the Display Name field empty, I should see Field is required message
the Email field does not follow (@domain.com) format, I should see Incorrect Email message
I navigate to my gmail and click on the reset password link in my gmail
I should be directed to a new page with Email, Password, Retype Password
Website field is not correct format,I should see Invalid url error message
i enter valid "craterusertesting@gmail.com" "Password1234@" and "Password1234@"
I provide Valid input for the required fields and click Save Customer button, I should be directed to Sales & Expenses page
If i validation passed, i should be directed back to login page

steps.name: I click +New Customer botton, I should directed to New Customer Page
I click on the Toggle Switch i should view a text box titled: “Customer Portal Login URL” and “http://invoice.primetech-apps.com/crater-invoice/customer/login “ Url
I enter valid Email
I click copy to clipboard button, I should see “Please copy & forward the above given URL to your customer for providing access.” message
I click on Send Reset Link
i should be able to see password and confirm password field
I navigate to my gmail and click on the reset password link in my gmail
I provide invalid data to password field,i should see Password must contain 8 characters error message
I provide different password to the confirm password field I should see Passwords must be identical: password 12345678 confirm password 1234567
I navigate to Customers tab
Validate I am on the Customers page (Header)

steps.name: I click on Filter Icon, I should be able to see Display Name, Contact Name, Phone and clear all link

I type value in the phone field,the matching result should return

I enter a value that is not exist in the database I should see the empty table with No Results Found message
I click clear all, application will display current list of customer
I click on Filter Icon again, I should be able to see Display Name, Contact Name, Phone and clear all link
